long_definition: terms related to fundamental principles of Ayurveda
science where advantageous and disadvantageous, happy and unhappy (states of) life along with what is good and bad for life, its measurement and life itself are described
combination of the body, sense organs, mind and soul
the sustenance of life or the aspect of life which prevents decay
that which keeps the body alive
continuous or uninterrupted process of life
continuity of result in the form of life due to the association of body, sense organs, mind and soul; which transmigrates from one body to another
Four patterns of lifestyle viz., wholesome, unwholesome, happy and unhappy
lifestyle which is beneficial to the self and the society
lifestyle which is neither beneficial for the society nor for the self
